    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S282_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S282_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Comparing stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen der Sterne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparer tient le premier rôle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparando estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confrontare le stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση των αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comparar las estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Stars can necessarily be observed only at a distance. This unit introduces the Hertzsprung–Russell diagram, an essential tool in understanding the nature of stars. You should have some understanding of the basic stellar properties of luminosity and temperature in order to get the most from the unit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Luminosity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Nebulae</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Red_giant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Supergiant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">White-dwarf</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterne können nur in einem Abstand 
notwendigerweise beobachtet werden. Diese Maßeinheit stellt das
Hertzsprung?Russell Diagramm, ein wesentliches Hilfsmittel vor, wenn 
sie die Natur der Sterne versteht. Sie sollten etwas 
Verständnis der grundlegenden stellaren Eigenschaften von Helle und 
von Temperatur haben, um die die meisten von der Maßeinheit zu 
erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tient le premier rôle peut nécessairement être 
observé seulement à une distance. Cette unité présente le 
diagramme de Hertzsprung?Russell, un outil essentiel dans 
l'arrangement que la nature de tient le premier rôle. Vous devriez 
avoir un certain arrangement des propriétés stellaires de base de 
la luminosité et de la température afin d'obtenir les la plupart à 
partir de l'unité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As estrelas podem necessariamente ser observadas 
somente em uma distância. Esta unidade introduz o diagrama de 
Hertzsprung?Russell, uma ferramenta essencial em compreender a 
natureza das estrelas. Você deve ter alguma compreensão das 
propriedades stellar básicas do luminosity e da temperatura a fim 
começar o a maioria da unidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le stelle possono necessariamente essere 
osservate soltanto ad una distanza. Questa unità introduce lo 
schema di Hertzsprung?Russell, uno strumento essenziale nel capire la 
natura delle stelle. Dovreste avere certa comprensione delle 
proprietà stellar di base della luminosità e della temperatura per 
ottenere il la maggior parte dall'unità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αστέρια μπορούν απαραιτήτως να παρατηρηθούν μόνο 
σε μια απόσταση. Αυτή η μονάδα εισάγει το 
Hertzsprung?Russell διάγραμμα, ένα ουσιαστικό εργαλείο στην 
κατανόηση της φύσης των αστεριών. Πρέπει να έχετε κάποια 
κατανόηση των βασικών αστρικών ιδιοτήτων της φωτεινότητας και της
θερμοκρασίας προκειμένου να αποκτηθούν οι περισσότερες από τη 
μονάδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las estrellas se pueden observar necesariamente 
solamente en una distancia. Esta unidad introduce el diagrama de
Hertzsprung?Russell, una herramienta esencial en entender la 
naturaleza de estrellas. Usted debe tener cierta comprensión de
las características estelares básicas de la luminosidad y de la 
temperatura para conseguir el la mayoría de la unidad.</string>
          </description>
